p: Inner Mongolia has long been considered as a daodi area of RA, with high production rates and superior quality. As such, RA was popularly used in traditional Chinese medicinal practice. With its long production and supply history, the practice of RA production is found to consist of 10 mature VCs, which can be distinguished by their various composite patterns of stakeholders. Typically, RA goes through six production stages until it reaches the herbal wholesale and retail markets shown in Figure 2.
